title: 我的世界转载MOD无法启动 纯净版可以运行。求解决！
author: 低调丶小嗨
txt_content:
电脑系统WIN8 64  纯净版可以运行 转载MOD无法打开 没提示 直接关闭 旋律给的调试信信息：                                                                   [08:56:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Using primary tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLTweaker
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [FML]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.10.25.1202 for Minecraft 1.7.10 loading
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [FML]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM, version 1.8.0_25, running on Windows 8:x86:6.2, installed at C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.8.0_25
[08:56:55] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod lain.mods.inputfix.InputFix does not have a MCVersion annotation, it may cause issues with this version of Minecraft
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [FML]: Loading tweaker optifine.OptiFineForgeTweaker from OptiFine_1.7.10_HD_U_A4.jar
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name optifine.OptiFineForgeTweaker
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker
[08:56:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker
[08:56:55] [main/ERROR] [LaunchWrapper]: Unable to launch
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
 at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.checkForComodification(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_25]
 at java.util.ArrayList$Itr.remove(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_25]
 at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.launch(Launch.java:117) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
 at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28) [launchwrapper-1.9.jar:?]
                                              [qq]1169144495[/qq]     求大神解决下小弟先谢过了 我QQ在线点击企鹅联系我（1169144495）

replies.author: lwbzyb
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 lwbzyb 于 2014-11-15 11:39 编辑 

JAVA请确认是x64，jre7，还有就是内存设置成1024或是2048.

replies.author: 夜绫千裕
replies.txt_content: Forge与jre8存在兼容bug , 请使用jre7

replies.author: Wai_01
replies.txt_content:
如果你的java剛升了8版本，而你的Forge又不能用的話
這個就能幫到你了，小弟是一個成功的例子
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
LexManos (Forge目前主要開發者)開發了LegacyJavaFixer
只要把成品放到Mods資料夾
就可支援Java8了
跨版本支援(1.7.2/1.6.4)

replies.author: pan_dajie
replies.txt_content: 你下载的mod可以已经坏了
